example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 尝到) (NP-OBJ (NP (NN 创汇) (NN 农业)) (NP (NN 甜头))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NP-PN (NR 广东)) (NP (NN 农民)))) (PU ，) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 积极)) (VP (VV 引进) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *RNR*-3)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 精心)) (VP (VV 种养) (NP-OBJ-3 (ADJP (JJ 优稀)) (ADJP (JJ 名贵)) (NP (NN 品种)))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 尝到 创汇 农业 甜头 的 广东 农民
优稀 名贵 品种
